english_translation: Narrated through multiple chains about Hibban ibn al-Harith: We took suhur (pre-dawn meal) with 'Ali. Jrir also narrates similarly from Munsor through Shabib from Abu 'Aqil. Husayn narrates from Zaidah through Shabib from Tariq ibn Qurrah and Hibban ibn al-Harith with similar meaning. Muhammad ibn Sa'id narrates from Sharik through Shabib from Hibban, he said: We declared Ihram (pilgrimage intent) with 'Ali and he traveled us to al-Nahruwan. Ibn Sharik reports: My father narrated to me, he said: Shabib narrated to me from Abu 'Aqil Hibban ibn al-Harith - I think from Bariq - similar narration. Ishaq narrated to us: 'Affan narrated to us, he said: Abu al-Ahwas narrated to us, he said: Shabib narrated to us from Hibban ibn al-Harith and Tariq with similar meaning. Muhammad narrated: Al-Ghundar narrated to us, he said: Shu'bah narrated to us from Shabib from Hibban: We took suhur with 'Ali.

english_translation: Narrated about a narrator who heard from Ibn Umar. Musa ibn Ismail said: From Abd al-Qahir, who heard Abdullah ibn Yazid, from Hibban. And Abdullah ibn Muhammad narrated to us: Wahb ibn Jarir narrated to me from my father, heard from Raziq the owner of al-Duthaina: I met Ibn Umar during the Fitnah (trial/civil strife). And Musa narrated: Muhammad ibn Salim the owner of Ayla narrated to us, heard Hibban al-Salami at al-Duthaina, heard Ibn Umar: You will fight over the worldly life.

Mu'adh ibn Mu'adh said: And 'Issam ibn Khalid: Hariz narrated to us from Hibban. And Yazid ibn Harun said: Hayyan, and the first is more correct. Hariz narrated to us that 'Amr said: Yahya narrated to us from Thawr, Hariz narrated to me from Abu Khidash from a man among the Companions of Prophet Muhammad ﷺ.

english_translation: This is reported by Musa ibn Ismail and Malik ibn Ismail. Al-Salt ibn Muhammad said: Hayyan ibn Zuhayr heard from Burayd ibn Abi Maryam, Muhammad ibn Wasi', Talha ibn Kariz, Thabit, and Hisham ibn Urwah. Al-Salt said: I saw Hibban at the end of his life and mentioned from him the confusion (ikhtilat). And Musa narrated to us: Hibban ibn Yasar said: Abu Mutarrif 'Ubaidullah ibn Talha ibn 'Ubaidullah ibn Kariz narrated to us: Muhammad ibn 'Ali al-Hashimi narrated to me from Nu'aym al-Mujmir from Abu Hurayrah from Prophet Muhammad ﷺ: Whoever is pleased that he should be recompensed fully when he prays upon us, the people of the household, let him say: O Allah, pray upon the Prophet and his wives, the mothers of the believers, and his progeny and the people of his household, as you have prayed upon Ibrahim. Verily you are praiseworthy and glorious. And David ibn Qais narrated from Nu'aym al-Mujmir from Abu Hurayrah the prayer upon Prophet Muhammad ﷺ. And Abdullah ibn Maslamah from Malik from Nu'aym, heard Muhammad ibn Abdullah ibn Zayd from Ibn Mas'ud from Prophet Muhammad ﷺ, and this is more authentic. And Wahb ibn Jarir said: Abu Zuhayr Hayyan ibn Zuhayr al-'Adawi narrated to us. And others said: Hayyan ibn 'Ubaidullah.

english_translation: Narrated about the brother of Mandal al-'Anzi, Abu 'Ali al-Kufi - he is not strong among them. Muhammad ibn Sabbah said: Hibban ibn 'Ali al-'Anzi narrated to us from Suhail from his father from Abu Hurayrah that Prophet Muhammad ﷺ said: When one invokes supplication for his brother in the unseen, the angels say: And for you likewise. And Umayyah said: Yazid ibn Zur'ah narrated to us from Rawh from Suhail from Talha al-Khuzaʿi from Um al-Dardaʿ from Prophet Muhammad ﷺ. And Musa said: Hibban ibn Yasar narrated to us that Talha ibn 'Ubaidullah ibn Kariz al-Khuzaʿi narrated to me: Um al-Dardaʿ informed me that he entered upon her in Syria, so she said: Abu al-Dardaʿ used to say it. And Al-Nadr said: Musa ibn Tharwan informed us, Talha ibn 'Ubaidullah heard from Um al-Dardaʿ, he narrated to me: My master from Prophet Muhammad ﷺ. And Ahmad ibn Ishkab said: Ibn Fudail narrated to us from his father from Talha ibn Kariz from Um al-Dardaʿ from Abu al-Dardaʿ from Prophet Muhammad ﷺ. And Ibn Salam said: Ibn Abi Ghaniyyah informed us, 'Abdul-Malik ibn Abi Sulayman narrated to us from Abu al-Zubayr from Safwan ibn Abdullah ibn Safwan heard Um al-Dardaʿ from Prophet Muhammad ﷺ saying: I met Abu al-Dardaʿ and he mentioned about Prophet Muhammad ﷺ. Muhammad ibn 'Amr narrated to me, Sahl ibn Hammad narrated to us, Abu Makin who is Nuh ibn Rabi'ah narrated to us, 'Aun ibn Abdullah narrated to us, Um al-Dardaʿ narrated to us from Abu al-Dardaʿ his words.

english_translation: Narrated about the subject from his brother Khuzaimah. 'Abdul-Karim ibn Abi al-Mukhariqa narrated from him. Musa ibn Ismail said from Muhammad ibn Rashid from 'Abdul-Karim from Hibban ibn Jiz' from Abu Hurayrah from Prophet Muhammad ﷺ: Is there a right in wealth after Zakat? He said: Yes, it is carried upon the camel (given as charity). And Musa said: From Mukhariqa ibn 'Abdul-Rahman, he heard Hibban ibn Jiz' al-Sulami, who heard Abu Hurayrah and Ibn Umar.

english_translation: He is different from Huwaytib. From Prophet Muhammad ﷺ: The angels do not accompany a caravan in which there is a bell. Abu Ma'mar said from Abd al-Warith from Husayn from Ibn Buraidah. And Ishaq said: Abd al-Samad narrated to us, he said: My father narrated to us, he said: Husayn narrated to us from Ibn Buraidah that Hawt ibn Abd al-'Uzza narrated from Prophet Muhammad ﷺ.
